page.title: 04FRIENDS OF WILLOUGHBY
page.content: In July 1978 a number of parents of children at Willoughby Primary School formed a group and called themselves the{Friends of Willoughby School.}It was formed to provide funds for improving facilities at the school and to help keep the school open when the number on roll was low.Most years the Friends of Willoughby School hold a family Bar_b_que and Disco, a christmas Dance and they have previovsly held a Donkey Derby and a Car Rally.The money raised has been used to provide the school with the cabin,which provides extra classroom space, an overhead projector and screen, a television set and sports equipment.The functions organised are attended by many people from the village especially the parents of the pupils at the school.
